If you don’t like #politics, you probably shouldn’t follow me. 😁 Though I do also have a #creative side, and I'm a #maker too.

note: Broadcast sound engineer with a home production system (pic) - ProTools, Logic. Anti-capitalism as it’s killing us. Anti-Tory for the same reason. Wears a mask and believes in science, as that is saving us. Wear a mask - covid is NOT over. #nobot

I won't forgive liars, cheats, hypocrites or chancers who have knowingly made our lives worse, for their own gain.

I am intolerant of people that use the word Woke as a criticism. All it means is Considerate.

I am intolerant of Tory enablers who know their own interests are best served by voting to get them out, even if they have to hold their noses.

My top tags are #FBPE #FBPA #FBPPR #GTTO
